amendment.description: To provide provisions related to the role of diplomacy, foreign aid, and the military in the war on terrorism.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3942 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3942 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S10040-10041) To provide provisions related to the role of diplomacy, foreign aid, and the military in the war on terrorism.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3942 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator McCain.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3942 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
